channel.title: Arrav - Remake
channel.description:
[center][font=times new roman]Welcome to Arrav's Advertisment page! Arrav is a 317 Runescape private server which strives for perfection, using the most effective system, and even driven handlers our game play is as smooth as it can possibly be. Our server is full multi-threaded, Countless hours writing content, but we surely also do spend a lot of time in performance boosting our server, so it can handle large amounts of players. We're new, however rapidly growing. Enjoy the pictures!
==================================================
[url=http://www.arrav.net48.org/]http://www.arrav.net48.org/[/url]
==================================================
Developers -Mark
Features - No lag, 24-7. - Stable economy. - Perfectly working Hunter - Perfect combat - Revenants - 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others. - 1 Custom quest - Full farming - Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etc...) - Dungeoneering with mutliple floors - Summoning with all familiars - Newest hitmarks - Glacors + Steadfast, Gaiven and Ragefire boots - Full pest control - Full Castle Wars - Full duel arena - Abysall whip vine - Pk points System - Killstreak system - Hiscores - Perfect Ancient Curses. - Perfect korasi sword. - Slayer helm fully working - Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape - All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working. - Working renewal, augury & rigour & ring of vigour prayers - All npcs have a good variety of drops. - Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn. - Advanced teleporting system with jewellery. - Active Community with professional forums. - Regular double exp/drops weekend. - Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches. - Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat. - Perfect Switching. - Regular community events & drop parties.
Pictures:[/font][/center] [center] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/zy7m3d.jpg[/img] [img]http://s24.postimg.org/r0bx1yaf9/arrav3.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/3orhnf0dn/arrav2.png[/img] [img]http://s18.postimg.org/giwy2bn4p/arrav4.png[/img] [img]http://s18.postimg.org/8vemxrduh/arrav5.png[/img] [img]http://s22.postimg.org/zg1hj0xpt/arrav6.png[/img][/center]

item.description:
@Stramonta wrote:

[center][font=times new roman]Welcome to Arrav’s Advertisment page!
Arrav is a 317 Runescape private server which strives for perfection,
using the most effective system, and even driven handlers our game play is as smooth as it can possibly be. Our server is full multi-threaded, Countless hours writing content, but we surely also do spend a lot of time in performance boosting our server, so it can handle large amounts of players. We’re new, however rapidly growing. Enjoy the pictures!

==================================================

http://www.arrav.net48.org/

==================================================

Developers
-Mark

Features

  • No lag, 24-7.
  • Stable economy.
  • Perfectly working Hunter
  • Perfect combat
  • Revenants
  • 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others.
  • 1 Custom quest
  • Full farming
  • Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etc…)
  • Dungeoneering with mutliple floors
  • Summoning with all familiars
  • Newest hitmarks
  • Glacors + Steadfast, Gaiven and Ragefire boots
  • Full pest control
  • Full Castle Wars
  • Full duel arena
  • Abysall whip vine
  • Pk points System
  • Killstreak system
  • Hiscores
  • Perfect Ancient Curses.
  • Perfect korasi sword.
  • Slayer helm fully working
  • Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape
  • All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working.
  • Working renewal, augury & rigour & ring of vigour prayers
  • All npcs have a good variety of drops.
  • Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn.
  • Advanced teleporting system with jewellery.
  • Active Community with professional forums.
  • Regular double exp/drops weekend.
  • Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches.
  • Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat.
  • Perfect Switching.
  • Regular community events & drop parties.
